query:
SELECT s.id, s.name, s.gender, s.birth_date, a.main_goal, a.exercise_experience, a.weekly_frequency, a.training_restrictions 
FROM students s 
LEFT JOIN anamneses a ON s.id = a.student_id 
WHERE s.name = 'Laura' LIMIT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT s.id, s.name, s.gender, s.birth_date, a.main_goal, a.exercise_experience, a.weekly_frequency, a.training_restrictions 
FROM students s 
LEFT JOIN anamneses a ON s.id = a.student_id 
WHERE s.name = 'Laura' LIMIT 1;
